user.title: Configure Thermostat Contact Sensors
user.description: Set up monitoring of contact sensors to automatically pause your thermostat when doors/windows are left open.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this configuration
data_description.contact_sensors: Select all door and window sensors to monitor
data_description.thermostat: Select the thermostat/climate entity to control
data_description.open_timeout: Minutes a sensor must be open before pausing thermostat
data_description.close_timeout: Minutes all sensors must be closed before resuming thermostat
data_description.notify_service: Enter a notify service (e.g., notify.mobile_app_phone) or leave empty to disable

error.no_sensors_selected: Please select at least one contact sensor

init.title: Thermostat Contact Sensors Options
init.description:
Adjust timeouts and notification settings. You can use template variables in messages:
- `{{ trigger_sensor_name }}` - Friendly name of the sensor that triggered
- `{{ open_count }}` - Number of open sensors
- `{{ open_timeout }}` / `{{ close_timeout }}` - Timeout values
- `{{ previous_mode }}` - Previous HVAC mode

data_description.open_timeout: Minutes a sensor must be open before pausing thermostat
data_description.close_timeout: Minutes all sensors must be closed before resuming thermostat
data_description.notify_service: Service to call for notifications (e.g., notify.mobile_app_phone). Leave empty to disable.
data_description.notification_tag: Tag to use for persistent/replaceable notifications
